item.title: taryn add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "[D]on't ever apologize to an author for buying something in paperback, or taking it out from a library (that's what they're there for. Use your library). Don't apologize to this author for buying books second hand, or getting them from bookcrossing or borrowing a friend's copy. What's important to me is that people read the books and enjoy them, and that, at some point in there, the book was bought by someone. And that people who like things, tell other people. The most important thing is that people read... " -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: taryn add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "And in that moment, I swear we were infinite." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: taryn add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "There's nothing like deep breaths after laughing that hard. Nothing in the world like a sore stomach for the right reasons." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: taryn add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "This moment will just be another story someday." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: taryn add a quote by Brian Andreas
item.description:
"I was waiting for the longest time, she said. I thought you forgot.
It is hard to forget, I said, when there is such an empty space when you are gone." -- Brian Andreas
